title: 저작자 목록
content:
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel .content-type-title > h3 {
  margin: 0;
}
.content-panel .content-type-title h3 {
  font-size: 120%;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 5px 20px;
  background-color: #666;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.8),
    inset 0 15px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.2),
    inset 0 15px 10px rgba(255,255,255,.2);
}
.content-panel .content-type-options{
  padding: 0 20px;
}
.content-panel .content-type-options ul {
  padding-left: 2em;
  margin-left: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
설명이 어쩌고저쩌고
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel left-column standalone"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
+++ SCP-EN :: Foundation [[image United-Kingdom.png  height="10px"]] [[image USA.png height="10px"]] [[image Auzi.png height="10px"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-options"]]
[[=image CC-by-sa.png width="150px"]]
* [[[copyright:credits-en| 저작자 목록-EN ]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel right-column standalone"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-options"]]
[[=image CC-by-nc-sa.png width="150px"]]
* [[[copyright:credits-ru| 저작자 목록-RU ]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
